name: Idle Worlds
description:
Idle Worlds is a simple but at the same time complex idle game with various gameplay possibilities. Travel between 8 different worlds and upgrade local generators to increase your profit. Use unique upgrades system to boost your stats or discover even more interesting prestige system to maximize your profit.

ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY

Build your own idle farm across the worlds! Unlock dozens of generators and maximize your profit with endless upgrades.

UPGRADES AND PRESTIGE SYSTEM

Purchase various upgrades to boost your profit. Discover the complex prestige system with 92 unique upgrades and create your own playthrough.

UNIQUE EVOLUTION SYSTEM

Evolve your generators into something really powerful. Сomplete all conditions to get incredible game changer bonuses!

EXTRA FEATURES

Use the interest system to get an extra passive income. And don't forget to collect free rewards with time! Can you also unlock all the collectibles?

GAME COMPLETION

Unlike other idle games Idle Worlds can be completed. Are you ready for the challenge?

LEADERBOARD AND ACHIEVEMENTS

Unlock all 100 achievements and take the first place at the global ranking system. But don't imagine it will be easy!

PIXEL GRAPHICS AND MINIMALISTIC UI

Cute and fancy pixel tiles and backgrounds. High quality mode is also available for your choice.


Idle Worlds is a game worth trying. Get it now and receive hours of fun and joy with tough and interesting challenges!
